title: Mini Sap
description:
For those having issues with Mini SAP installation on their machines, here is a VM preconfigured and ready to use.

Important:

Your host machine must be running a 64 bit (x64) operating system
Your host machine must have VM hardware acceleration present and enabled in your BIOS
Oracle VirtualBox and Extension Pack must be installed

License issued by SAP only has 3 months validity

To renew the license, access the transaction SLICENSE and get Active Hardware Key.

Fill out the form on the http://www.sap.com/minisap page. Provide the details as follows:
Enter Salutation, First Name, Last Name, a valid Email address, and the SDN User Id in order to receive the license.
Choose NSP - SAP NetWeaver 7.0 (and your Enhancement Pack Level, e.g. 7.02) as System ID and provide the Hardware key you just obtained from the system.
After some minutes you will receive an email with the license file attached. Store the attached file on your hard disk and go back to the SLICENSE transaction.
Make sure that the correct screen is displayed (screen caption is SAP License Administration # Digitally-Signed License Keys).
If not, change the screen by clicking the New Licenses button. Click the Install button.

If the torrent donÃ‚Â´t work try the download diretc link:
